languages.text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} deals Warp damage and the radius is increased to 2 cells. The wearer still takes Energy damage

traits.locale_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} deals Warp damage and the radius is increased to 2 cells. The wearer still takes Energy damage

languages.text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target except the wielder is changed to {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}.

{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

languages.text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыв плазмы{/g} от этого оружия поражает цели в радиусе 2 клеток. Тип получаемого при взрыве урона меняется на {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} для всех целей, кроме персонажа.
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target except the wielder is changed to {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыв плазмы{/g} от этого оружия поражает цели в радиусе 2 клеток. Тип получаемого при взрыве урона меняется на {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} для всех целей, кроме персонажа.

{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыв плазмы{/g} от этого оружия поражает цели в радиусе 2 клеток. Тип получаемого при взрыве урона меняется на {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} для всех целей, кроме персонажа.

languages.text: この武器によって引き起こされる{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}は、半径2セル内の対象に影響を与える。使用者を除く各対象へのダメージタイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープ{/g}ダメージとして扱われる。
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: この武器によって引き起こされる{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}は、半径2セル内の対象に影響を与える。使用者を除く各対象へのダメージタイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープ{/g}ダメージとして扱われる。

languages.text: Durch diese Waffe verursachte {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} wirkt auf Ziele in einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Der Schaden aller Ziele mit Ausnahme des Trägers wird als {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g}-Schaden gewertet.
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Durch diese Waffe verursachte {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} wirkt auf Ziele in einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Der Schaden aller Ziele mit Ausnahme des Trägers wird als {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g}-Schaden gewertet.

languages.text: La {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosión de plasma{/g} de esta arma afecta a un radio de 2 casillas. El tipo de daño infligido a todos los objetivos excepto el portador pasa a ser daño de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: La {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosión de plasma{/g} de esta arma afecta a un radio de 2 casillas. El tipo de daño infligido a todos los objetivos excepto el portador pasa a ser daño de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}disformidad{/g}.

languages.text: 这把武器造成的{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}等离子爆炸{/g}会影响距离2格内的所有目标。除了装备者之外，其他目标受到的伤害视为{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间{/g}伤害。
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器造成的{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}等离子爆炸{/g}会影响距离2格内的所有目标。除了装备者之外，其他目标受到的伤害视为{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间{/g}伤害。

languages.text: L'{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosion de plasma{/g} provoquée par cette arme affecte les cibles situées dans un rayon de 2 cases. Les dégâts infligés à chaque cible, en dehors de l'utilisateur, sont considérés comme des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosion de plasma{/g} provoquée par cette arme affecte les cibles situées dans un rayon de 2 cases. Les dégâts infligés à chaque cible, en dehors de l'utilisateur, sont considérés comme des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}.

languages.text: Bu silahın sebep olduğu {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plazma Patlaması{/g}, 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki hedefleri etkiler. Kullanan kişi haricindeki tüm hedeflere verilen hasar türü, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} olarak kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahın sebep olduğu {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plazma Patlaması{/g}, 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki hedefleri etkiler. Kullanan kişi haricindeki tüm hedeflere verilen hasar türü, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} olarak kabul edilir.
